sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"孤单的，寂寞的"之意。
means: lonely ： 强调孤独感，含"渴望和他人在一起"的意味。
alone ： 普通用词，指独自一人的状态，有时含孤寂之意。
desolate ： 语气强烈，强调遭受损失和失去亲人所带来的难以忍受的痛苦。
solitary ： 可指因被遗忘或遗弃而产生的孤独感，也可指人的生性孤僻。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Latin solitarius, from solus 'alone'

entry.def: A person or animal that is solitary spends a lot of time alone.

example.ex: Paul was a shy, pleasant, solitary man...
example.tran: 保罗是一个羞怯、友善、惯于独处的男人。

example.ex: They often have a lonely and solitary life to lead.
example.tran: 他们常常过一种独居的孤独生活。

entry.def: A solitary activity is one that you do alone.

example.ex: His evenings were spent in solitary drinking.
example.tran: 他晚上的时间都是靠独自喝闷酒打发。

entry.def: A solitary person or object is alone, with no others near them.

example.ex: ...the occasional solitary figure making a study of wildflowers or grasses.
example.tran: 偶尔出现的研究野花野草的孤单身影

entry.def: Solitary is the same as solitary confinement .

example.ex: Tom was in solitary across the way from me.
example.tran: 汤姆在我对面被单独监禁。

means.word_mean: 1. confinement of a prisoner in isolation from other prisoners;
1. characterized by or preferring solitude in mode of life;

sentences.sentence: "the eremitic element in the life of a religious colony"

means.word_mean: 2. of plants and animals; not growing or living in groups or colonies;

sentences.sentence: "he was alone when we met him"
"she is alone much of the time"
"a lonely fisherman stood on a tuft of gravel"

means.word_mean: 5. being the only one; single and isolated from others;

sentences.sentence: "the lone doctor in the entire county"

means.word_mean: 6. separated from or unfrequented by others; remote or secluded;

sentences.sentence: "a trail leading to an unfrequented lake"

auth_sentence.content: Polar bears are usually solitary and hunt on sea-ice.
auth_sentence.res_content: Polar bears are usually solitary and hunt on sea-ice.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Polar bears are usually solitary and hunt on sea-ice.

auth_sentence.content: He had felt alienated, cut off, solitary.
auth_sentence.res_content: He had felt alienated, cut off, solitary.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He had felt alienated, cut off, solitary.

auth_sentence.content: She is a fascinating combination of engaged and solitary.
auth_sentence.res_content: She is a fascinating combination of engaged and solitary.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She is a fascinating combination of engaged and solitary.

stems_affixes.word_buile: de加强+sol单独+ate表形容词→非常单独→荒凉的
sol单独+e→adj.单独的,唯一的 n.脚垫,鞋底

stems_affixes.value_cn: [好]孤独的;偏僻的;单一的,唯一的
stems_affixes.word_buile: sol单独+itary→adj.[好]孤独的;偏僻的;单一的,唯一的
sol单独+o音乐术语→n.独奏 adj.&adv.单独的[地];独唱的[地]
desolate[adj.荒凉的;孤独的 v.使荒芜]+ion表名词→n.荒凉,凄凉
i=in+s=sol单独+land陆地→在[海洋]中间的单独陆地→岛,岛屿
sol单独+e→adj.单独的,唯一的 n.脚垫,鞋底
sol单独+itude状态→单独的状态→孤独
sol单独+o音乐术语→n.独奏 adj.&adv.单独的[地];独唱的[地]
para旁边+sol太阳→太阳旁边→不晒太阳→遮阳伞
solar太阳的+ium地方→n.日光浴室,日晷
de加强+sol单独+ate表形容词→非常单独→荒凉的
in进入+sol太阳+ate使……→进入太阳之中
solar[adj.太阳的,日光的]+ize表动词→v.[摄]使过度曝光,晒 v.曝光

means.word_mean: 独自的; 单独的(通常用于名词前)

sentences.cn: 她喜欢独自长距离散步。

means.word_mean: (人或动物) 喜欢(或惯于)独处的
(人、物或处所）单个的； 孤单的；孤零零的

sentences.en: A solitary light burned dimly in the hall.
sentences.cn: 大厅里点着一盏孤灯，发出昏暗的光。

jushi.english: Can you give me one solitary piece of proof?
He has been used to the solitary life.
jushi.chinese: 他已经习惯了这种幽静的生活。

jushi.english: Jerry is a solitary sort of fellow.
